name: wp-cloudflare-dashboard
description: A Cloudflare Analytics Dashboard for Wordpress.

scripts.dist: git branch -D dist && git push origin :dist && git checkout -B dist && rm -rf .bowerrc .editorconfig .eslintrc.js .eslintrc.json .gitignore .sass-lint.yml .travis.yml .yo-rc.json bower.json composer.lock Gruntfile.js Gulpfile.js package.json phpcs.xml phpunit.xml README.md tests node_modules && composer install && echo 'node_modules' > .gitignore
